about_the_game:
Download this to use La Mariposa in DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters.

This may be offered as a free trial for a limited time in the future.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes: Online modes for Dead or Alive 5 Last Round will be added in a patch within 3 months of release.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes: Online modes for Dead or Alive 5 Last Round will be added in a patch within 3 months of release.
